title: Filter mobile users out of the client
body: Can we get a filter to hide mobile users in the client? It's annoying seeing people perma-logged in on my friend list that are not actually online to play with. Especially those users who haven't even logged into the client in months and are essentially inactive. I have had to remove the app from my phone and after 3 days I still appear in my friend's friend list. Any idea whether this is being looked at?

replies.body: I would like to bump this. I was just about to create a post about this. I do find if very annoying when having a large list of online people however most of those people are loggin on their phones. Have a optiuoin to not show mobile online similar to the showing offline people.
